short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rid of all the distractions on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zen mode extension removes distractions from YouTube. May it be a content such as a news feed, notifications or suggestions of similar videos to the one you are currently watching on youtube.
